title: Joy — not just fatigue — will shape news habits in 2026
description: News today can be a lot to take in. Deportations. Wars. Tariffs. Trump did what?! The consistent barrage of negative, seemingly urgent events can wear people down, so much so that news fatigue has become a common experience. According to Pew, in 2024, 62% of U.S. adults reported feeling worn out by election coverage. A...
